item.title: Getting started with AWS
item.description: What is AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a secure cloud services platform. It provides a broad set of infrastructure services, such as computing power, storage options, networking and databases. Millions of customers use AWS cloud products and solutions to build sophisticated applications. source : https://aws.amazon.com/what-is-aws/ Getting Started Create a New Account Go to https://portal.aws.amazon.com/billing/signup# Get Hands On These 10-Minute Tutorials are simple “Hello, World!” technical documents to help you get hands-on with AWS.
